channel.title: Prayer books [Change Magic tabs, lunar, ancients, modern.]

item.title: Prayer books [Change Magic tabs, lunar, ancients, modern.]
item.dc:creator: @Bronze_Elite Bronze Elite
item.description:
@Bronze_Elite wrote:

First tutorial. So…

[font=Verdana]I’M BAGEL ON R-S!![/font]

Okay, I thought to myself, does any server thats 508 have books that change your magic tab? So I made it.

Open up ItemSelecet.java - in… rs2/io/packets.

Put these cases in there somewhere.

case 6767: //Book p.requestAnim(5864, 0); p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 192); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You converted back to Modern Magic.(MADE BY Bagel)"); break; case 9003: //Book p.requestAnim(5864, 0); p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 193); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You converted back Ancient Magic.(MADE BY Bagel)"); break; case 13151: //Book p.requestAnim(5864, 0); p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 430); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You converted back Lunar Magic.(MADE BY Bagel)"); break;

Heres a command that I just made to get the books. <-- put in Commands.java. [duh.]

if(cmd[0].equals("books")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6767, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9003, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 13151, 1); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Combat book = Lunar. Security book = Ancients. Book = Modern."); }

What it does: It changes the magic tab to Modern Magic Tab, Lunar Magic Tab, Ancients Magic Tab by clicking ‘Read’ on it.

Combat book = Lunar.
Security book = Ancients.
Book = Modern.

PIC:
